sentences.en: Bartleby sat in his hermitage, oblivious to everything but his own peculiar business there.
sentences.cn: 巴特比独处一隅,忙着自己的事情,对外界的一切不闻不问.

sentences.en: Grandfather sat by the fireplace, oblivious of everything around him.
sentences.cn: 祖父坐在火炉旁, 忘却了周遭的一切.

sentences.en: He was oblivious of his promise.
He was quite oblivious to the danger he was in.
sentences.cn: 他完全忘记了自己处于危险中.

sentences.en: Jealousy can make you totally oblivious to the good things you have.
sentences.cn: 嫉妒常使你对本身具有的优点全然不知.

sentences.en: Meanwhile all the others work on, oblivious to their rotted - out neighbor.
sentences.cn: 其余的人仍在继续干活, 而对他们的邻居正在腐烂这件事一无所知.

sentences.en: Mother has become quite oblivious after the illness.
sentences.cn: 这次病后,妈妈变得特别健忘.

sentences.en: Oblivious to her scrutiny, Ken wriggled in his seat, slow.
sentences.cn: 易忘的到她仔细研讨, 肯恩在他的座位中蠕动, 慢地.

sentences.en: She lay motionless where she was, oblivious to pain.
sentences.cn: 她一动不动地躺在原地，已经感觉不到疼痛。

sentences.en: She was oblivious to our warnings.
Still she was motionless, like a curled up, oblivious creature.
sentences.cn: 可她却仍然不动弹, 犹如一只蜷缩的, 被人遗忘的动物.

sentences.en: The Dharma until then is completely oblivious to such people.
sentences.cn: 放弃幻相之前,我们无从看到佛法的真相.

sentences.en: The proposals are not new, a number of them have been acted upon in one form or another, others are underway—no university that I know of is oblivious to the revolutions of network and Web.
sentences.cn: 这些提议并不新鲜，其中很多都已经以这样或那样的形式付诸实施过，其他的也正在进行中——据我所知，没有一所大学会忘记网络和网页革命。

sentences.en: We manoeuvre through the surface of life, oblivious to the depths below.
sentences.cn: 我们总在生活的表层上居住着, 却忽略了深层的问题.

sentences.en: Were they oblivious to the poisons they were ingesting?
sentences.cn: 他们浑然不觉正在摄入的毒药?

sentences.en: Wrapped in her problems , Chin was oblivious to her surroundings.
sentences.cn: 她并不注意到周围的一切.

trans.tran_cn: 忘却的，健忘的，不注意的，不知道的
trans.tran_en: not knowing about or not noticing something that is happening around you
